hero.description: Managex offers tailored business services in marketing, design, accounting, and HR — powered by smart systems and deep market insight.

about.title: About Us
about.description: Ghaymah Al-Etihrafiyah is a Saudi commercial establishment (branded as ManageEx) is your strategic partner in delivering integrated business solutions that drive growth and operational efficiency. Our service portfolio spans marketing and branding, design, advanced accounting systems, and human resources management.
about.commitment: We are committed to empowering entrepreneurs and business owners by offering high-quality, cost-effective services designed to optimize resources, streamline operations, and enable you to focus on scaling your core business activities.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: We strive for excellence and leadership in delivering administrative solutions to businesses, with a strong commitment to precision, cost efficiency, and adherence to the highest quality standards. Our approach is rooted in simplicity and transparency, ensuring a seamless and distinguished client experience.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: At ManageEx, we provide comprehensive solutions that support businesses in enhancing efficiency, reducing costs, and streamlining operations. With our professional team and innovative technologies, we empower our clients to achieve their strategic goals and strengthen their market impact, while ensuring the delivery of integrated services that elevate their operations to new levels of excellence and leadership.

strategy.title: Our Strategy
strategy.quality: Quality: Leveraging technology and continuous team training to achieve the highest quality standards.
strategy.cost: Cost: Reducing human resources costs by 50% through a professional team and optimized execution time.
strategy.time: Time: Continuously improving processes to ensure efficiency and effectiveness.
strategy.simplicity: Simplicity: Streamlining operations to deliver fast and efficient service.
strategy.control: Control: Implementing a rigorous review system to ensure service quality.

services.title: We offer services tailored specifically to meet your needs
services.subtitle: You Name IT We Make IT.
services.youNameItTitle: You Name IT We Make IT

accounting.title: Accounting Solutions
accounting.description: ManageEX provides comprehensive accounting solutions to help businesses manage their finances and ensure compliance with legal and accounting standards. Our goal is to deliver accurate, professional services that enhance financial performance and support business growth.

financial.title: Financial Solutions
items: Balance Sheet preparation
Income Statement preparation
Cash Flow Statement preparation

bookkeeping.title: Bookkeeping
items: Recording and organizing financial transactions
Tracking revenues and expenses
Preparing periodic reports to monitor financial performance

tax.title: Tax Management & Filing
items: Preparing and submitting tax returns
Tax planning to minimize legal liabilities
Managing VAT and tax invoicing

payroll.title: Payroll & Compensation Management
items: Calculating salaries and preparing payroll sheets
Handling tax and social insurance deductions
Issuing and managing payment receipts

auditing.title: Financial Auditing & Review
items: Auditing accounting operations to ensure accuracy and integrity
Analyzing financial data and providing comprehensive reports
Assessing financial risks and recommending improvements

analysis.title: Financial Analysis & Planning
items: Delivering in-depth financial analysis to support decision-making
Developing sustainable financial strategies
Providing business development financial consulting

hr.title: HR Solutions
hr.description: ManageEX offers integrated, modern HR solutions that empower companies to build strong teams and achieve optimal operational efficiency. We support our clients in managing their human resources professionally while ensuring compliance with internal policies and labor regulations.

services.recruitment: Recruitment & Talent Acquisition - Identifying suitable candidates based on job requirements, screening applicants and conducting initial interviews to ensure the best fit, offering recruitment consulting, including designing the full recruitment process for a professional experience
services.management: Employee Affairs Management - Preparing employment contracts and managing employee files in compliance with current legal frameworks, tracking attendance, leaves, and shifts to maintain workflow organization
services.training: Training & Development - Creating and delivering customized training programs based on staff needs and company goals, enhancing leadership and management skills to boost operational efficiency
services.performance: Performance Management & Competency Evaluation - Setting performance metrics aligned with business goals and strategic vision, conducting periodic reviews and offering recommendations to optimize efficiency
services.consulting: HR Consulting - Offering solutions to improve workplace culture and increase employee loyalty, developing compliant HR policies, designing performance-based reward systems to boost productivity

marketing.title: Marketing Services
marketing.description: ManageEx offers comprehensive marketing solutions to help businesses strengthen their online presence, engage effectively with customers, and achieve sustainable growth. We design and implement tailored marketing strategies using compelling content, well-planned advertising campaigns, and performance analytics to ensure optimal results.

social.title: Social Media Management
items: Managing multiple accounts on social media platforms
Monthly content plan that reflects the project's identity and supports its activities to achieve its strategic objectives
Scheduling posts and daily account supervision to maintain digital presence
Setting up automated responses to improve customer interaction

content.title: Content Creation
items: Writing compelling marketing content that reflects your brand and builds trust
Producing high-quality short videos (Reels) for effective promotion
Developing storytelling campaigns to highlight your project's core message
Crafting monthly SEO-friendly blog posts for better search visibility

advertising.title: Paid Advertising Campaigns
items: Designing and managing targeted ad campaigns across various platforms
Precise audience targeting based on user behavior
Detailed reports on campaign results and audience behavior analysis

seo.title: Search Engine Optimization (SEO)
items: Comprehensive analysis of keywords related to the target field
Optimizing website structure and content to increase visibility in search engine results
Writing monthly articles and blog posts aligned with SEO standards
Providing monthly reports showing improvements in ranking and traffic

Brand guidelines including color schemes, typography, and usage rules
Business cards, letterheads, stickers, and brand-supporting tools

Innovative and ready-to-use presentation designs (PPTs/Slides)

social.title: Social Media Visual Content

Editable templates for unified publishing
Covers, flyers, and promotional posters for your products and services

packaging.title: Packaging & Print Materials

Promo brochures and handouts — high quality

visualContent.title: Social Media Visual Content
items: Interactive and consistent post designs aligned with your brand identity
Editable templates for regular and unified content publishing
Covers, flyers, and promotional posters tailored to your products/services

packaging.title: Packaging & Print Materials
items: Design menus, packaging, and bags that reflect brand quality and enhance the customer experience

whyChooseUs.title: Why ManageEx
whyChooseUs.description: ManageEx is a leading provider of specialized business services, including digital marketing, creative design, accounting, and human resources. We offer flexible, tailor-made solutions designed to meet each client's operational and financial needs. Our goal is to help businesses grow and improve efficiency through smart administrative systems and professional services built on deep market and client insight.
whyChooseUs.challenges: We help companies overcome the challenges caused by administrative energy drain and high human resource costs through:

solutions.management: Full or partial management of companies
solutions.cost: Cost reduction thanks to a trained and specialized team
solutions.efficiency: Enhanced operational efficiency and simplified administrative procedures for effective performance
solutions.training: A high-level training system to boost team capabilities
solutions.followup: A dedicated follow-up department to ensure quality
